EmailTemplate.name: Grand & Toy Business Services (1561402155.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy Business Services (1561402155.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Fil,
In preparation for our meeting next week, below is a link to our "Business Services" some of which may apply to the conversation we will be having about your facility supply procurement, particularly the Janitorial/ Cleaning equipment sections. From a product standpoint we have many categories which I've also sent links for.
If you have any information on the types of products you purchase and what your monthly/ annual spends are, can you have them prepared for our meeting?
Please have a look at the links below your convenience:
Business services
https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/service-solutions.aspx <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/service-solutions.aspx]]>
Product categories
https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Cleaning-Maintenance/_/N-dxp <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Cleaning-Maintenance/_/N-dxp]]>
https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Mail-Pack-Ship/_/N-cwx <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Mail-Pack-Ship/_/N-cwx]]>
https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Health-Safety/_/N-cya <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/catalog/Health-Safety/_/N-cya]]>
See you next week Thursday at 11am.
Best regards.
Liz Rust Business Development Manager, Central Canada 200 Aviva Park Dr, Vaughan, ON L4L 9C7 E-mail: elizabethrust@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:elizabethrust@grandandtoy.com]]> | Cell: 365-778-8250 Office Supplies | Interiors & Furniture | Print & Documents | Facility Resources | Technology
